q1.question: Is falavra really free?
q1.answer: Yes! The free tier lets you transcribe up to 3 videos per day with a 15-minute duration cap using the base Whisper model. No credit card required.

q2.question: What do I get with Pro?
q2.answer: Pro unlocks unlimited transcriptions, no duration limits, all Whisper model sizes (tiny through large-v3), SRT/VTT subtitle export, and priority batch processing.

q3.question: Is it a one-time purchase?
q3.answer: Yes. Pay once and own falavra Pro forever for the current major version (v1.x). No subscriptions, no recurring charges.

q4.question: How many devices can I use?
q4.answer: A single Pro license can be activated on up to 3 devices (macOS, Windows, or a mix).

q5.question: What about future updates?
q5.answer: All updates within v1.x are included free. If a major new version (v2.0) is released, existing Pro users will get a significant upgrade discount.

q6.question: Is there a refund policy?
q6.answer: Yes. We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied, contact support@falavra.com for a full refund.

q7.question: Does falavra need internet?
q7.answer: Only for downloading YouTube audio and the initial Whisper model download. Transcription itself is 100% offline.

q8.question: What languages are supported?
q8.answer: Whisper supports 99+ languages with automatic language detection. The larger the model, the better the accuracy for less common languages.

q9.question: What platforms are supported?
q9.answer: falavra runs on macOS 11+ and Windows 10+.

q10.question: Can I export subtitles?
q10.answer: Pro users can export to SRT and VTT subtitle formats. Free users can export to Markdown and plain text.

q11.question: How accurate is the transcription?
q11.answer: Accuracy depends on the Whisper model selected and audio quality. The large-v3 model (Pro) delivers state-of-the-art accuracy comparable to commercial services.

q12.question: How do I activate my license?
q12.answer: After purchase, you'll receive a license key via email. Open falavra, go to Settings → Enter License Key, paste your key and click Activate.

q13.question: I lost my license key. What do I do?
q13.answer: Visit the Restore License page on our website and enter your purchase email. We'll resend your license key immediately.

modelDownload.q: How do I download Whisper models?
modelDownload.a: Open falavra and go to Settings → Models. Select the model you want and click Download. Models are downloaded once and cached locally.

accuracy.q: The transcription isn't very accurate. How can I improve it?
accuracy.a: Try using a larger Whisper model (Pro feature). The large-v3 model provides the best accuracy. Also, audio quality significantly impacts results — clear speech produces better transcriptions.

formats.a: Free: Markdown (.md) and plain text (.txt). Pro: Also includes SRT and VTT subtitle formats.

offline.q: Can I use falavra completely offline?
offline.a: Transcription works offline after the initial model download. However, downloading YouTube audio requires an internet connection.

free.q: What are the free tier limits?
free.a: Free users can transcribe up to 3 videos per day with a maximum duration of 15 minutes per video, using the base Whisper model.

activate.q: How do I activate my Pro license?
activate.a: Go to Settings → Enter License Key in falavra. Paste the key from your purchase email and click Activate.

machines.q: How many machines can I use?
machines.a: Your Pro license works on up to 3 devices. You can deactivate a device from Settings to free up a slot.

lost.q: I lost my license key. How do I recover it?
lost.a: Visit falavra.com/restore and enter the email you used during purchase. Your license key will be resent immediately.

upgrade.a: All v1.x updates are included with your Pro license. Major version upgrades (v2.0+) may require a paid upgrade at a discount.

requirements.a: macOS 11 (Big Sur) or later, or Windows 10 or later. At least 4GB RAM recommended. Storage varies by model (75MB to 3GB).

storage.q: How much disk space do I need?
storage.a: The app itself is small. Whisper models range from 75MB (tiny) to 3GB (large-v3). Transcriptions and downloaded audio use additional space.

privacy.a: Yes. All transcription processing happens locally on your machine. No audio or text data is ever sent to any server.

youtube.q: Does falavra support any video URL?
youtube.a: Currently falavra is optimized for YouTube URLs. Support for additional platforms may be added in future updates.

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.description: Privacy Policy for falavra — how we handle your data.

overview.title: Overview
overview.text: falavra is a desktop application designed with privacy as a core principle. All transcription processing happens locally on your device using Whisper AI (sherpa-onnx). We do not collect, transmit, or store your audio files or transcription results.

audioProcessing.title: Audio & Video Processing
audioProcessing.text: falavra downloads YouTube audio to your local machine and processes it entirely on-device:

items.noUpload: Audio files are never uploaded to our servers
items.noStorage: Transcriptions are stored only on your local device
items.noAccess: We have no access to your content at any time

purchase.title: Purchase Information
purchase.text: When you purchase a Pro license, your email address and payment information are processed by Stripe. We store your email and license key to manage your license.

license.title: License Validation
license.text: When activating your license, falavra sends your license key and a device identifier to verify activation. We store the device ID to manage your 3-device limit.

telemetry.title: Website Analytics
telemetry.text: Our website uses Umami, a privacy-focused analytics tool:

items.events: Anonymous page views and click events
items.noPersonal: No personal data or cookies are used
items.optOut: You can block analytics with any ad blocker

thirdParties.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParties.stripe: Payment processing for Pro license purchases
thirdParties.supabase: License key and newsletter subscriber storage

noTracking.title: No Tracking in the App
noTracking.text: The falavra desktop application does not include any analytics, telemetry, or tracking. It does not phone home, check for updates without your consent, or send any data about your usage.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.text: License information is retained as long as your license is active. Newsletter subscriptions can be cancelled at any time by contacting support. We do not sell or share your data with third parties.
